document_data.name: Mental Barrier
document_data.mainbody: '''''Mental barrier''''' was a [[psionic]] devotion of the [[telepathy]] [[discipline]] that allowed the [[psionicist]] to protect their mind with a wall of thought.
document_data.Effects: ''Mental barriers'' protected against a ''[[psionic blast]]'' but could be penetrated with a ''[[psychic crush]]''.

Notable Users.Individuals: * [[Vhondryl]], a psionicist in [[Skullport]] and head of the [[Hall of Mental Splendor]]{{Cite dragon/172/Seeing the Sights in Skullport|12, 14, 88}}
